thread.title: Funds will help afford bass trail rescue/recovery tanks | Local News | timesdaily.com
thread.title_full: Funds will help afford bass trail rescue/recovery tanks | Local News | timesdaily.com

author: Russ Corey Staff Writer
title: Funds will help afford bass trail rescue/recovery tanks | Local News | timesdaily.com
text: FLORENCE — The Alabama Resource Conservation & Development Council has awarded a $15,000 grant to the Alabama Bass Trail to assist in the purchase of two rescue and recovery tanks that will be used in bass trail events throughout the state.
